snippet: An overhaul before the 2010 Masters yielded a versatile 18-acre area where golfers can adjust their games to weather and course conditions before the shots that count.
abstract: Overhaul of the practice range at Augusta National Golf Club before the 2010 Masters has yielded a versatile 18-acre area where golfers can adjust their games to weather and course conditions before the shots that count.
lead_paragraph: An overhaul before the 2010 Masters yielded a versatile 18-acre area where golfers can adjust their games to weather and course conditions before the shots that count.

headline.seo: At Augusta, Players’ Favorite Practice Range
headline.main: For Players at Augusta National, the Practice Range Is Perfect
headline.print_headline: At Augusta, the Practice Range Feels Just Like the Real Thing
